channel.title: 1.6 on Edmonton Go
channel.description: Recent content in 1.6 on Edmonton Go

item.title: February 2016 Meetup
item.description: Please RSVP at Meetup or Google+. We get things started at 6:30 pm. Sponsors Food provided by Bellstone Engineering. Venue provided by Startup Edmonton. eBook Giveaway from Manning Publications: Go in Practice by Matt Butcher and Matt Farina MongoDB in Action, Second Edition by Kyle Banker, Peter Bakkum, Shaun Verch, Douglas Garrett, and Tim Hawkins Redis in Action by Josiah Carlson Talks Go 1.6 was released on February 17th. We will be discussing the changes during our February meetup.
